title: IMF's second tranche finalisation to Sri Lanka in December: central bank governor
description:
The second tranche of the $2.9 billion IMF bailout for Sri Lanka, around $330 million, is expected to be finalized within a month, says central bank governor.

The second tranche of the USD 2.9 billion IMF bailout for cash-strapped Sri Lanka would be finalised within the next month, central bank gov...
